title: Scam fixed
text: Been playing the game for about a week as it takes quite a lot of bingo games to spend the whole Â£75 after being given a Â£50 bonus after depositing Â£25 which isnâ€™t so good an offer anyway. Well after spending it all on bingo over a week I won a total of Â£0. Not even 1 win. Thatâ€™s because itâ€™s fixed, only certain names pop up all the time and even know Tombola claim everyone has an equal chance, they are lying. On one of the games you can pick the amount you want to put in for a higher prize, however, people that put in a lower amount have the same chance but win less. Therefore only the people that put in less ever win. For example, I put in a Â£1 and someone else puts in 25p. If I win a full house I would get Â£60 and if they get a full house they only win a partial amount, something like Â£20 meaning that when a person who has bet less wins, Tombola make extra profit. Itâ€™s a con and even if they reply to this they will lie and say everyone has an equal chance. Go and play using Coral, itâ€™s a lot faster, buy as many tickets as you like from 5p. Iâ€™ve won Â£150 on a Â£1 bingo. Should have never tried tombola. Even the bonus at Coral is better.

title: Winning Not!
text:

title: Great app
text:
This app has to be one of the best to play on. Everything is so simple and straightforward that even someone like me who  is not good with technology can easily understand how it works. 
BRILLIANT . And then you win !
Now i know why Tombola is the number one site for so many people. Like the app it is honest and straightforward .

title: Great
text: I love tombola and have won decent amounts quite a lot of the time, had a quick go this morning and won Â£101 and last week Â£60, both from Â£10 deposits. I do wish you would change the minimum to Â£5 though so I can just have a few games.
